name: LinkedIn Post Ideas Generator - n8n Features

parameters.prompt:
You are a social media expert for n8n automation platform. Create 5 engaging LinkedIn posts based on this content: {{ JSON.stringify($json.content, null, 2) }}

Format each post as:

POST 1:
Title: [Catchy title]
Content: [Engaging 100-150 word post with emojis]
Hashtags: [5-7 relevant hashtags]
CTA: [Clear call-to-action]

[Repeat for posts 2-5]

Make posts professional, engaging, and appealing to developers and business users.
